doc:
McLean Stevenson https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/McLean_Stevenson 0 Edgar McLean Stevenson Jr. (November 14, 1927 – February 15, 1996) was an American actor and comedian. He is best known for his role as Lt. Colonel Henry Blake in the television series M*A*S*H, which earned him a Golden Globe Award in 1974. Stevenson also appeared on a number of television series, notably The Tonight Show Starring Johnny Carson and The Doris Day Show. Edgar_McLean_Stevenson_Jr. ( November_14_,_1927 – February_15_,_1996 ) was an_American_actor_and_comedian .
